00026 public class ATLrunConfigurationTest {
00027                 
00028         private final URI umlModel      = URI.createFileURI("./Resources/testing/demo.uml");
00029         private final URI simulinkModel = URI.createFileURI("./Resources/testing/demo.simulink");       
00030         private final URI atlSource     = URI.createFileURI("./Resources/testing/east2simulink.atl");
00031         private final URI atlCompiled   = URI.createFileURI("./Resources/testing/east2simulink.asm");
00032         private final URI wrongURI              = URI.createURI("thisShouldFail");
00033         
00034         private ATLrunConfiguration config = null;
00035         
00036         @Before 
00037         public void setUp() {
00038                 config = new ATLrunConfiguration( atlSource, atlCompiled );
00039         }
00040         
00041         @After
00042     public void tearDown() {
00043         config = null;
00044     }   
00045 
00046         
00047         @Test
00048         public void testConfigurationIsComplete() throws URInotFound {
00049                 addSources();
00050                 assertFalse( config.isComplete() );
00051                 addDestination();
00052                 assertTrue( config.isComplete() );
00053         }
00054 
00055         private void addDestination() throws URInotFound {
00056                 config.addDestination(simulinkModel, ATLrunConfiguration.simulinkMetaModel);
00057         }
00058 
00059         private void addSources() throws URInotFound {
00060                 config.addSource(umlModel, ATLrunConfiguration.umlMetaModel);
00061                 config.addSource(umlModel, ATLrunConfiguration.eastMetaModel);
00062         }
00063         
00064         @Test
00065         public void testPathMap() throws URInotFound {
00066                 addSources();
00067                 addDestination();
00068                 Map<String, String> pMap = config.getPathsMap();
00069                 assertEquals(ATLrunConfiguration.umlMetaModel.toString(), pMap.get("UML"));
00070                 assertEquals(ATLrunConfiguration.simulinkMetaModel.toString(), pMap.get("SIM"));
00071                 assertEquals(umlModel.toString(), pMap.get("IN1"));
00072                 assertEquals(umlModel.toString(), pMap.get("IN2"));
00073                 assertEquals(simulinkModel.toString(), pMap.get("OUT1"));
00074         }
00075         
00076         // @see ModelTowerListTest.java
00077         // modelID -> metamodelID
00078         @Test
00079         public void testInModelsIDMap() throws URInotFound {
00080                 addSources();
00081                 addDestination();
00082                 Map<String, String> modelsIDs = config.getInModelsIDMap();
00083                 assertEquals("UML", modelsIDs.get("IN1"));
00084                 assertEquals("EST", modelsIDs.get("IN2"));
00085         }
00086 
00087         // @see ModelTowerListTest.java
00088         // modelID -> metamodelID
00089         @Test
00090         public void testOutModelsIDMap() throws URInotFound {
00091                 addSources();
00092                 addDestination();
00093                 Map<String, String> modelsIDs = config.getOutModelsIDMap();
00094                 assertEquals("SIM", modelsIDs.get("OUT1"));
00095         }

00098         public void testInOutModelsIDMap() throws URInotFound {
